description: Detects tampering of autologger trace sessions which is a technique used by attackers to disable logging
name: AutoLogger Sessions Tamper
query: ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\WMI\\Autologger\\* AND winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\EventLog\-* OR *\\Defender*) AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\Enabled OR *\\Start) AND winlog.event_data.Details:"DWORD\ \(0x00000000\)") AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:"C\:\\Windows\\system32\\wevtutil.exe"))))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
